page.first: Join the first in-person event of the Angola Open Source Community in Luanda.

headline.third: impact on the country's technological innovation.
headline.fourth: Our mission is to promote the development and adoption of Free and Open-source Software (FOSS) in Angola.

data.title: Fostering the culture of open-source software.
data.body: Promoting awareness of the benefits of open-source software and encouraging its use in Angola.

data.title: Accelerating open-source development.
data.body: Offering resources and mentoring programs, workshops, and other events to help Angolan developers learn and excel in open source.

data.title: Establishing partnerships and collaborations.
data.body: Strengthening the open-source community in Angola by facilitating the exchange of knowledge, resources, and experiences among developers.

motivations.second: We are guided by a set of motivations that help us effectively achieve our mission.

data.title: Open Source in Angola
data.body: We aim to increase the recognition of the open-source community in Angola.

data.title: Open Source in Angola
data.body: Open-source software is a powerful tool for a country's technological and economic development.

data.title: Promoting innovation and technological development
data.body: By empowering Angolan developers to actively participate in this ecosystem, we hope to drive local innovation, stimulate job creation, and contribute to the digital transformation of the country and the world.

program.second: Includes a week of online workshops and introductory training on Git and other essential tools for open-source software development.
program.fourth: Connects experienced mentors, talented contributors, and open-source organizations to contribute to open-source projects.
program.sixth: Provides a solid foundation of knowledge and skills for Angolan developers looking to contribute to open-source software projects.

footer.zero: Our goal is to develop and promote FOSS in Angola.
